page.title: 10Highbrook - Bluebell Jubilee
page.content: To celebrate the first 25 years of this privately owned railway several special events were held. Displays of Fire Engines, Vintage Engines, Steam Engines and Military and Vintage Vehicles were arranged. A special Silver Jubilee week-end took place on the 3rd - 4th August which was the nearest date to the 7th August 1960 when the first train ran. The original engines were used and the scene as it was in 1960 was recreated. Drivers, guards and station staff wore the old uniforms. The final event of the year will be the running of the Santa Special when children have an opportunity to meet Santa Claus on the train and receive a present. This special train runs on Saturdays and Sundays in December.
